metadata.title: CVE-2018-7456 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
A NULL Pointer Dereference occurs in the function TIFFPrintDirectory intif_print.c in LibTIFF 3.9.3, 3.9.4, 3.9.5, 3.9.6, 3.9.7, 4.0.0alpha4,4.0.0alpha5, 4.0.0alpha6, 4.0.0beta7, 4.0.0, 4.0.1, 4.0.2, 4.0.3, 4.0.4,4.0.4beta, 4.0.5, 4.0.6, 4.0.7, 4.0.8 and 4.0.9 when using the tiffinfotool to print crafted TIFF information, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2017-18013. (This affects an earlier part of the TIFFPrintDirectoryfunction that was not addressed by the CVE-2017-18013 patch.)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7456` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5').
